channel.title: How to disable the quest tab on a 317 server/client
channel.description: Hi im coding a server and client and I want to make it so players cant click on the music tab on there client, its a blank area when u go to it and its just kinda annoying. Anyoneone have a tip for me? Luv, Andrew
